prod_short_desc: Stop the crooks from stealing their car again!
prod_long_desc:
Be part of the action with the LEGO® City police as they haul the crook’s vehicle to impound, featuring an Auto Transporter with an adjustable, two-level rack and lowering ramps, police car and crooks’ motorbike with a sidecar, plus an adjustable barrier with lamppost. Includes four minifigures.
Includes four minifigures: two police officers and two crooks.
Features a police Auto Transporter, police car, crooks’ motorbike with sidecar and crooks’ car.
Auto Transporter features a cab with attached two-level rack that can hold two vehicles, lowering ramps at the back, adjustable top rack to drive a vehicle off, plus an adjustable barrier gate with a lamppost.
Crooks’ motorbike features a sidecar.
Crooks’ car features a small spoiler
Throw the hook onto the Auto Transporter to climb onto the vehicle.
Lower the ramps and drop the second level down to drive the car off the transporter.
Accessory elements include a walkie-talkie, handcuffs, two money bills, backpack and a hook.
This set offers an age-appropriate build and play experience for ages 5-12.
Auto Transporter measures over 3” high, 8” long and 2” wide.
Police car measures over 1” high, 4” long and 1” wide.
Crooks’ car measures over 1” high, 3” long and 1” wide.
Crooks’ motorbike with sidecar measures over 1” high, 2” long and 1” wide.
Police barrier measures over 4” high, 4” wide and 1” long.
